description: man and woman holding hands in center of sheet; man's head is on the woman's shoulder; profile of dog with head and neck pointing upward on the right side of the image; mountain peak behind couple
inscription: LLC in plate: Walter. 1920 / Juni. | URC in plate: LIEBE PINA | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Walter Gramatté, Heimkehr, E 144 | LLC of sheet in blue crayon crossed out with red, on verso: 101 | LRC of sheet in red crayon, on verso: 57 [encircled with red crayon]
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 20. | LL in pencil, below image: Heimkehr.
title: Homecoming
